page.title: 09LIFE STYLES-WEST NOTTINGHAM.
page.content: This is what children have to say: "In my spare time I play on my bike." "I go to Judo Club over Basford Crossings.""At Brownies we play lots of games & you win prizes.""On Mondays & Wednesdays I go to band practice." "My brother does a paper round,he delivers 300 papers on Thursday.""My Dad does all the housework whilst Mum reads the Sun!""I play football at the top of the sreet.""I live next door to two old age pensioners & I go shopping for them." Our mums & dads go to the pub,walk their dog,go swimming or do the gardening.Some visit the library & dads work on their cars.Old-age pensioners stay at home most of the time.Sometimes they visit friends or grand-children.One old lady is afraid to go out because of boisterous children!
